storyInfo: Amiya overcomes Babel's enemies from the past, and hurries over to the Doctor and W. Kal'tsit also successfully breaks free and reunites with the group. Amiya sees the revenant's entire life and prepares for a final showdown.

attributes.content: You've held on for so long—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Panting heavily)
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: But not any longer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Panting heavily)
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Shadow swallows the figure up. Apparitions from the past pull him back into the fold.
More of them emerge from the darkness.
Still not giving up?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have nothing left to 'give up'.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: You could've attacked me together, but you didn't...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't sense any anger, but you're all submerged in sorrow...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're different from that revenant.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We are not here to kill you.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: We are here only to witness her success.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Sorry, but I can't stop here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black waves ripple from Amiya, suppressing the shadows.
She advances slowly, ignoring the blades streaking past her.
'King of Sarkaz'...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: You are her successor.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: The apparitions keep approaching Amiya, but are incessantly pushed away from her, falling back into the shadows.
Amiya continues forward.
Doctor... Dr. Kal'tsit... Theresa...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She touches the shadow.
She sees a completely crystallized door at the corridor's end, and a blade rushing toward her.
Shades of black coagulate in her palm, and she immediately catches the incoming blade...
Catching inexhaustible sorrow.
She sees the sorrow from the past—
Her Highness... she's dead... How...?
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: We lost...?
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: Her Highness... died because we failed our duty...
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: You... you're still... alive...
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: I can feel him gripping tightly on my collar.
Her Highness... is dead?
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: Our mission... is complete? It... is done...
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: Finish me off. Don't you want to... exact revenge for Her Highness?
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: There's still that grenade in my chest pocket... that crazy girl threw it to me, telling me to protect Her Highness.
I just... have to—
I don't know how long I spend hesitating.
But it is only when his hand droops down, and breathes his last...
That I realize that crazy girl was right.

attributes.text: Trash. Coward.

attributes.content: I've already forgotten how long I spent wandering in the wastes after leaving Babel.
Drifters until we meet some Royal Court recruiters. They say Her Highness has returned, and stands together with Theresis...
We knew then where we should go.
You come here in anger and ask me why I spread falsehoods among our people.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Come up here, before me...
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: And show me your wrath.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: The steps to Theresis number many, and the sovereigns of the Royal Court stare at me in indifference.
But I do not stop.
I am a coward no more. I will unleash my anger before Theresis, and then die by his blade.
I stand before him, but he does not greet me with his sword.
Theresis only nods.
Very good.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Keep your anger, but vent it somewhere else.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Because what you've heard is no lie.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: You found me, children.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I understood many things then. Her Highness died, but there she was, holding my hand.
The truth hurt me more than the lies did.
The sorrow that spread from the depths of my heart destroyed my anger so easily.
Your Highness...
The Highness we once swore to protect...
I... saw her...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Through your eyes... your life—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are they all dead? My only companions...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: No matter, they only left before I did. At least they stayed true to their task, they died to protect Her Highness.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: As will I, Amiya.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: All of you... you have my respect—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our past is no more. We chose to collude with disgrace.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: We willingly abandoned everything—only by doing so can we stand before Her Highness with a clear conscience.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: And that is why... we erased our names, and put on the clothes we once utterly detested.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: I have my own people to protect too. I can't stop here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Heh, you can try to stop Her Highness... only by defeating us.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Even if I am the only one left.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: You heart is going soft.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: If you can't even face me and defeat me, what makes you think you can face Her Highness, 'King of Sarkaz'?!
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: You will eventually have to face your own fate.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: My mind was already made up the moment I stepped onto this airship.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your sorrow, the Sarkaz's sorrow...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Should end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The apparition from the past finally falls back into the shadows.
*cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Be at peace—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh? That's a... grenade?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You said the Sarkaz will have a new future.
We rotten souls are meant to be incinerated, so why not burn for the ideal you described to us?
We failed Babel once, and it will not happen twice.
We shall protect you.
Death will witness our promise.
This coward will not break their promise, Your Highness Theresa...
Who the hell's fooling around with my grenades?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Stay focused! The revenant's shadow is trying to pull you into the darkness!;Careful! It seems like we can't harm it in any tangible way.

attributes.content: Gah. That chatty bastard pisses me off even more than these clingy sons of bitches!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Keep yapping, old coot, and I'll blow your nest into bits.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Those black shadows are persistently protecting its core.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Regular bombs aren't going to do shit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: {@nickname}. It can't affect your mind.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So you better not tell me you're out of ideas.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...I don't know much about revenants.;We have an expert on our side to ask for help.

attributes.content: Wait, where did Mon3tr go?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Keep to our original plan, and continue bombing the core cabin.;I gave it something else to do.

attributes.content: I think I figured it out.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If that's the case, then let's make some noise in here!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Though I won't have time to protect you, hood.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So you better start praying.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W aims her launcher up high, and the place feels increasingly dangerous with each pull of the trigger.
Every inch of the dome, every pillar, everywhere...
Explosives instantly latch onto everything you see.

attributes.text: Futile!

attributes.content: The revenant roars in anger.
These people are not worth his full wrath—it ought to be reserved for the origin of suffering.
For it will remember his anger, and inherit his rage at the very moment he sets himself free in death.

attributes.text: Get out!

attributes.content: Waves of shadow surge from every nook and cranny of the cabin.
An unending stream of shadows flow from the core and wrap around every explosive—
Darkness sweeps through explosions toward you.
Bubbles froth in the shadowy tide as blasts go off one after another, like pustules on a monster rushing in your direction.
The shadow creeps right before your eyes.
You look at W. She eventually throws out her final flash grenade towards the darkness—
Then, the shadows shroud you.

attributes.options: *sigh* I'll probably have to lie down for a few days after this.;I trust...

attributes.content: A feeble light leaks through a crack in the darkness.

attributes.options: I'm here—;I'm leaving the rest to you—

attributes.content: Shattered Originium fragments splash out from behind you.
A black thread immediately follows, weaving through the waves to find you.
It wraps around your hand, your body...
And pulls you free from the shadows completely.
Thank you for sending a signal.
I finally found you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're slower than I thought, bunny.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Thank you for protecting the Doctor, W.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Please leave the rest to me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We meet again, Revenant...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Get out of here!
Get out of my body!

attributes.content: Amiya captures the revenant's emotions from within the dark tides.
She sees a projection brimming with fury.
The revenant condenses his emotion into a phantom lance, towering above everything.
But why... is there an emotion hidden even deeper underneath his rage?
A feeling all too familiar, one that resonates with the vanished apparitions.

attributes.text: Outblood King!
You, who dare to shed false tears—
What makes you grieve for Sarkaz sorrows?!

attributes.content: The lance seems almost physical in the revenant's hand.

attributes.text: Our mission from millennia ago shall inevitably end in my very hands.
No one will stand between us—
And what we must witness—
The end of fate!

attributes.content: My tears fall for those gone souls of Babel...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And for you as well, Revenant.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black Arts coalesces before her.
You asked me, why I wish to stop this war...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have your answer now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've seen the path that lies ahead of us. This war shouldn't be part of the Sarkaz future—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Hypocrite!

attributes.content: The revenant gathers all his hate, rage, and pain into his palm...
The lance has taken physical form.
He throws his entire life towards Amiya.
It penetrates through a black barrier and pierces through her body.
In an instant, a sea of complex and unbounded emotions washes over Amiya...
She sees a blaze in the depths of a flaming forge.
She sees a huge, headless, hollow suit of armor as it trudges against a Catastrophe, leaving an endless trail on the land as it hauls ancient sacrificial stones behind its back.
She sees Elder Arts streaking across the horizon, smashing walls of stone into powder.
She sees a Sarkaz.
He stands with his back to a monolith. The foundation stone of his homeland, a fragment of Kazdel.
The Sarkaz shouts toward his King:

attributes.text: Kazdel stands behind me. They will not take it.
If that greedy Hegemon wants this piece of land, they can come and try.
But O King, as you say, there is nothing they can take away but ruin.
My tears have dried, and only rage remains, pulsing in my chest.
I will stay. I will guard this land, till death.
This is my mission.

attributes.content: Amiya sees the Sarkaz pointing toward the aloof Elders.
She sees the Hegemon surrounded by Elders, charging towards the group from Kazdel.
Shouts. Cries. Powerless gasps.

attributes.text: My tears have already dried, and it should be only rage that remains, pulsing in my chest...
But why do I still feel pain over my people's demise?
O King, I will not retreat even half a step from the frontline—

attributes.content: Amiya has seen it before, that cruel segment of history.
She has seen the first King of Sarkaz ignite an unprecedented Catastrophe, and every Hegemon and their troops besieging the city disappeared that very day...
Along with that King and his loyal subjects.

attributes.text: But why did the pitch-black Catastrophe that engulfed the sky disintegrate my body, while refusing to let me die?
That flash of light branded my figure into Kazdel's soil and rock for eternity.
Death betrayed me, and I became an eternal shadow of my homeland.

attributes.content: Your mission has already ended... That city has become a phantom from the past.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: ...Ended?
No, before death returns to me, before the Sarkaz's fate is rewritten—my duty remains.

attributes.content: Amiya's tears are wiped away by the storm.
She sees a Sarkaz—a Sarkaz who has been lingering for nine thousand years, waiting to complete a mission.
I see it now, Revenant—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your true form.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's true I'm not a Sarkaz, but I feel their suffering all the same first-hand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The crown I bear, and the future I'm unwilling to give up...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I never excluded the Sarkaz for even a moment.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will end all suffering. This is my answer to you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Within the infinite darkness, black threads twist around the lance running through Amiya and pulls it out of her.
Amiya aims the lance, and hurls it back with all her strength in the core's direction.
It rips the darkness apart, and the black tides recede from Amiya.

attributes.options: Amiya, you smashed the shackles!;You tore the shadow shrouding you apart.

attributes.content: I'm afraid what our bunny has done is more than that.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...I can only seal the revenant with its own emotions for a brief moment.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need to figure out a way... to put an end to the revenant's mission for good.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't look at me. I already tried bombing this place.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's useless.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We're not entirely helpless.
(Excited cry)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Doctor, your timing was impeccable.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The revenant relaxed his hold on me after you drew his complete attention.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And Mon3tr managed to locate me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Waving claws excitedly)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Thank you too, W. For buying the Doctor some time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph, I still have scores to settle—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's going on now?!
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...Do you guys feel... the airship accelerating?;The airship's trying to free itself from the skeleton!

attributes.content: It's the revenant... he's about to break free!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Theresa's helping him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It seems like she's already on the last stage of her plan. The revenant is responding to her call.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I didn't see her here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Her being here or not should not influence our own plans whatsoever.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: We need to release the revenant's control over the airship.

attributes.content: Yes. The most effective way to do so is to demolish the airship's core.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can only stop it by ridding its control and engine.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, please get behind me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Man, this old coot is such a pain in the ass.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We're basically helping him move house, right? Sounds pretty simple to me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.text: (Ancient Sarkaz language) Mission...
(Ancient Sarkaz language) Fate...
(Ancient Sarkaz language) End...

attributes.content: Kazdel's oldest guard awakens from his shackles.
The King of Sarkaz had him capture a sliver of his own consciousness from nine thousand years ago.
He has never been more clear than he is now, nor has he ever forgotten.
He no longer masks his sorrow with anger.

attributes.text: I will end you all, and our fate too.
